text.div: • Include codes from http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ObservationValue where concept is-a _CompositeMeasureScoring

name: CompositeMeasureScoring
title: CompositeMeasureScoring
description:
Observation values that communicate the method used in a quality measure to combine the component measure results that are included in a composite measure.

*Steward:* CQI WG
